Class SingleSymbolLegend

java.lang.Object
  com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.rendering.AbstractLegend
      com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.rendering.SingleSymbolLegend
All Implemented Interfaces:
ILegend, IVectorLegend, IPersistence
public class SingleSymbolLegend
extends AbstractLegend
implements IVectorLegend

Implements a legend composed by single symbols.

Author:
Vicente Caballero Navarro

getSymbolByFeature

public ISymbol getSymbolByFeature(IFeature feat)
Description copied from interface: IVectorLegend
Returns a symbol starting from an IFeature. TAKE CARE!! When we are using a feature iterator as a database the only field that will be filled is the fieldID. The rest of fields will be null to reduce the time of creation

Specified by:
getSymbolByFeature in interface IVectorLegend
Parameters:
feat - IFeature.
Returns:
Símbolo.
